document.full_text: new york attorney general eric schneiderman is investigating big banks like bank of america corp, morgan stanley and goldman sachs related to packaging of toxic mortgage loans into securities, the wall street journal reported, citing sources.
document.title: new york ag probes banks over mortgage securities: report
lines_and_colors: new york attorney general eric schneiderman is investigating big banks like bank of america corp, morgan stanley and goldman sachs related to packaging of toxic mortgage loans into securities, the wall street journal reported, citing sources.
